original_text: The police reported these words to the magistrates, and they were afraid when they heard that they were Roman citizens.
korean_text: 부하들이 이 말을 상관들에게 보고하니 그들이 로마 사람이라 하는 말을 듣고 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: The police reported these words to the magistrates
when they heard that they were Roman citizens.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 로마 시민이라는 것을 들었을 때.
